name: Full Ride! A College Dating Sim (Demo)
name_original: Full Ride! A College Dating Sim (Demo)
description:
It's your second year of college and you couldn't care less about making friends or dating.

 You have your visual novels and that's enough for you. At least, it was until life decided to throw you a curve ball.

 All of the sudden people actually seem to want to talk to you. Whether you like it or not people seem to like you. 

Will you allow these people into your life or keep them at a distance?

 I dunno man it's up to you.
